de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction

Interface NormalizedSimilarityFunction<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    SimilarityFunction<O>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NormalizedPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusteringAdjustedRandIndexSimilarityFunction, ClusteringBCubedF1SimilarityFunction, ClusteringFowlkesMallowsSimilarityFunction, FractionalSharedNearestNeighborSimilarityFunction, JaccardSimilarityDistanceFunction

    public interface NormalizedSimilarityFunction<O>
extends SimilarityFunction<O>
    Marker interface to signal that the similarity function is normalized to produce values in the range of [0:1].
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
